segments.text: How are you , Kim ? I haven ’ t seen you around for a few days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I was out sick most of last week . I ’ m still not completely over it . You ’ d better not get too close !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry to hear about that . Why don ’ t you join me for a hot cup of tea ? It ’ ll be good for you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , why not ? I could use a rest .
segments.speaker: S2
